ul.li: ->Awarded \'A\' Grade by Andhra Pradesh State Government.\n
->New Recognized as Andhra Pradesh State Skill Development Center.\n
->New 11 Doctorates in the department and 15 faculty members are pursuing Ph.D.\n
->New Permanently Affiliated to the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada.\n
->A Two day workshop on Cloud Computing held on October 2019 by APSSDC.\n
->Department is going to organize an workshop on MACHINE LEARNING in the second week of March\n
->Congratulations to all the Students who were qualified in RHCSA Certificatiton Conducted by Redhat.\n
->Congrats to our beloved faculty Mr.Thirupathaiah Amarthaluri, Ms. Yallanti Sowjanya Kumari and Mr. Yezarla Chittibabu for getting Ph.D.\n
St.Ann\'s College of Engineering and Technology,\n
